reference.shortdesc: The hasPart element specifies that the contained hierarchy expresses PART-OF relationships between subjects.

example.title: Example
example.p: This example specifies that a tire and a horn are each a part of a car.
example.codeblock: <subjectScheme> <hasPart> <subjectdef keys="car" navtitle="Car"> <subjectdef keys="tire" navtitle="Tire"/> <subjectdef keys="horn" navtitle="Horn"/> </subjectdef> </hasPart> </subjectScheme>
